DOC.brief_summary: To verify the non-inferiority of exemestane compared to anastrozole in time to tumor progression (TTP), the primary efficacy endpoint, in postmenopausal women with advanced/recurrent breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Aromasin Vs Arimidex Study As Initial Hormonal Therapy In Postmenopausal Women With Advanced/Recurrent Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Have histologically or cytologically confirmed breast cancer at original diagnosis. At study entry, the patient must have metastatic progressive or locally recurrent inoperable breast cancer. Having received any hormonal therapy (e.g., Tamoxifen, LHRHagonists) ovariectomy or any chemotherapy for advanced/recurrent breast cancer
